content: This is useless. No data, nothing to truly evaluate your statements. A lot of vague buzz words that could be interpreted to mean anything you want in a given situation. It’s the football equivalent of a TV psychic pretending to “hear” syllables whispered from the beyond before an overeager audience member blurts out “Sa? My Aunt Sarah died last year!” “Oh yeah, Peyton Manning was a winner!” Until you actually have anything tangible to back up your words this is a masturbatory exercise.
